b'Today the Guinness Storehouse will open their snowy gates, inviting all to a festive shopping experience like no other. 

For the month of December, the home of @guinness will be transformed into the ultimate Winter Village, complete with an exciting line-up of local craft makers, artists and much more.
 
The Winter Village will run for the month of December from 2pm \xe2\x80\x93 8pm Wednesday \xe2\x80\x93 Sunday, starting today December 4th.

To find out more about the Winter Village visit https://www.guinness-storehouse.com/en/winter-village
 
#Guinness #GuinnessStorehouse #WinterVillage 

Drink responsibly. DRINKiQ.com.'

b'As @johnniewalker marks 200 years, hear from our Global Consumer Planning Director Andrew Geoghegan on how brand milestones can help you look to the future and celebrate the past in his latest @marketingweeked column.

#JW200 #JohnnieWalker #KeepWalking

Drink responsibly. DRINKiQ.com

Read here: https://www.marketingweek.com/andrew-geoghegan-brand-birthdays-realign-future-celebrate-past/'

b'We\xe2\x80\x99ve launched a new social media responsible drinking campaign. 

In partnership with @wateraid, this new augmented reality filter - available on Instagram - challengers users to test their balance through a series of poses and is designed to encourage people to swap an alcoholic drink for water this festive period.

Visit @wateraid to donate directly.

#TheBalanceChallenge

Drink responsibly. DRINKiQ.com'

b'\xe2\x80\x9cHow can you take something, unpick it and do it in a new way because you can digitize the solution? How can you create better value for our customers and create better digital experiences for our consumers, using real-time data to maximize innovation in #eCommerce? This is how we think at #Diageo. It\xe2\x80\x99s all about creating efficient, effective and ambitious solutions which are super impactful across all our world-class brands.\xe2\x80\x9d \xe2\x80\x93 Paula Dart, VP eCommerce Global COE\xe2\x81\xa3 
\xe2\x81\xa3
Discover more about eCommerce at Diageo.com/careers\xe2\x81\xa3
\xe2\x81\xa3
Drink responsibly. DRINKiQ.com'

b'We\xe2\x80\x99ve made big strides reducing our environmental impact, but won\xe2\x80\x99t stop until we\xe2\x80\x99ve reduced it everywhere, we can: cutting down packaging, increasing recycled content and eliminating all waste :recycling_symbol_selector:

Find out more on Diageo.com #SpiritofProgress

Drink responsibly. DRINKiQ.com'

b'Every day this decade, we will commit to making more with less. From breweries in Kenya to distilleries in Scotland, every #Diageo drink will be made using 30% less water than today :droplet:

Find out more on Diageo.com #SpiritofProgress

Drink responsibly. DRINKiQ.com.'

b'\xe2\x80\x9cDiageo adapts quickly and successfully to change. Through introducing \xe2\x80\x98agile teams\xe2\x80\x99 in recent months, we have been able to create small, focused, cross-functional teams in #Thailand that work together to achieve unified success in a forever changing world.\xe2\x80\x9d \xe2\x80\x93 Nok Laohaphan, Traditional Trade Director :Thailand: \xe2\x81\xa3

b'We have already cut our carbon in half, but we must do more, which is why we\xe2\x80\x99re committed to being net zero carbon in our direct operations by 2030, using renewable energy across all of our brands.

b'Our commitment is to attract and retain the most diverse talent while creating the most inclusive culture. Our ambition is to increase representation of leaders from ethnically diverse backgrounds to 45% by 2030. 

It\xe2\x80\x99s the right thing to do, and it\xe2\x80\x99s right for our business. Find out more on Diageo.com #SpiritofProgress

b'Thank you to everyone who joined our first ever LinkedIn LIVE event as we officially unveiled our \xe2\x80\x9cSociety 2030: Spirit of Progress\xe2\x80\x9d 10-year action plan to the world :globe_showing_Europe-Africa:

b'We are proud to be ranked no.1 for Food, Soft Beverages and Alcohol and no. 22 overall in the\xc2\xa0@FinancialTimes\xc2\xa0Diversity Leaders ranking of Europe\xe2\x80\x99s most inclusive companies.\xe2\x81\xa3
\xe2\x81\xa3
Mairead Nayager\xc2\xa0Chief HR Officer said: \xe2\x80\x9cChampioning inclusion and #diversity is central to our strategy, and I am delighted that #Diageo has been recognised by the Financial Times today. It is particularly meaningful that this ranking is based on our employees\xe2\x80\x99 views of our inclusion and diversity work, and (on behalf of the HR leadership team) we want to thank every employee for striving to build the most inclusive culture at Diageo where each individual can thrive and contribute their fullest.\xe2\x80\x9d\xe2\x81\xa3
\xe2\x81\xa3
Click the link in our bio to find out more.\xe2\x81\xa3
\xe2\x81\xa3
Drink responsibly. DRINKiQ.com'

b'We are thrilled to announce that Johnnie Walker, the world\xe2\x80\x99s number one Scotch whisky, launches two exclusive Chinese New Year limited editions today: a first-of-a-kind John Walker & Sons King George V limited edition and a beautifully illustrated Johnnie Walker Blue Label.
 
The 2021 Chinese New Year design was created by award-winning Chinese artist Shirley Gong. Shirley says: \xe2\x80\x9cI wanted this limited edition to be something that would celebrate and honour Chinese New Year as well as a piece of art that speaks to the rare craft and character of Johnnie Walker Blue Label.\xe2\x80\x9d
 
#JohnnieWalker #ChineseNewYear
 
Drink responsibly. DRINKiQ.com'

b'\xe2\x80\x9cHere at #Diageo Moet Hennessey Thailand, inclusion and #diversity is so heavily embedded into our culture that we have created an environment where individuality of all kinds is valued. From my first day, I instantly knew that I had found a company where I can be the very best version of myself.\xe2\x80\x9d \xe2\x80\x93 Natthorn Saithong, Controls, Compliance & Ethics Manager :Thailand: \xe2\x81\xa3

b'\xe2\x80\x9cI\xe2\x80\x99ve been fortunate enough to work in different marketing roles around the world with #Diageo and it is continuously amazing to see a creative, consumer-centric organisation with tons of cultural #diversity, lots of humanity and an endless persistence to break down barriers and move the world forward.\xe2\x80\x9d \xe2\x80\x93 Jos\xc3\xa9 V\xc3\xa9lez, Culture, Content and Influencers Manager :Colombia: \xe2\x81\xa3

b'We are delighted to announce the launch of our World Class Studios virtual learning platform. :cocktail_glass:

The program - aimed at educating bartenders through a series of accredited modules - has gone virtual for 2020. The online learning portal provides unlimited access to masterclass tutorials, industry knowledge and top bartending tips from many of our world-leading drinks professionals - wherever you are in the world.

Visit Diageo.com to find out more.

Drink responsibly. DRINKiQ.com

b'\xe2\x80\x9cDiageo Business Services #India (DBSI) provides me with the opportunity to interact with people from all kinds of diverse backgrounds, allowing me to see the power that a business truly has when employees feel as though they can bring their own cultural uniqueness to work. I am proud to be a part of the DBSI community and will continue to pursue my passion of creating an inclusive workplace for all.\xe2\x80\x9d - Payel Chakrabartti, FC Process Governance Manager :India: \xe2\x81\xa3\n\xe2\x81\xa3\nDrink responsibly. b'Today @roeandcowhiskey have announced the launch of their first Single Malt Irish Whiskey, Roe & Co Cask Strength 2020 Edition.
 
A thirteen-year-old single malt which has spent its life entirely in Port Casks, giving it a rich depth and intensity of flavour. 

An exceptional release from Roe & Co, this single malt has notes of dark berry, chocolate, and spices making it a whiskey of supreme quality.
 
Drink responsibly. DRINKiQ.com
 
#RoeandCo #RoeandCoWhiskey #SingleMalt'

b'The oceans cover 70% of the earth\xe2\x80\x99s surface but only 13% of the world\xe2\x80\x99s oceans are classified as truly wild, or unaltered by intense human activity.
 
Over the next three years, @talisker is working with @parley.tv and a network of partners around the world to support the preservation of 100 million square meters of marine ecosystems worldwide.\xe2\xa0\x80
 
Drink responsibly. DRINKiQ.com
 
#Talisker #Madebythesea #whisky #adventure #Rewildourseas'

b'As we come to the end of INC week, Diageo\xe2\x80\x99s dedicated inclusion week, hear from global leads Charlotte and Joshua on why it\xe2\x80\x99s important, and how it contributes to Diageo\xe2\x80\x99s wider commitment of creating the most inclusive and diverse culture for all employees:\xe2\x81\xa3
\xe2\x81\xa3
Charlotte: \xe2\x80\x9cINC week isn\xe2\x80\x99t just about one week of events, it\xe2\x80\x99s about helping to build a culture within #Diageo where everyone feels as though they can bring their true authentic self to work. We all have our day roles, but through INC week and through celebrating diversity in all its forms, we get an insight into what unites us as colleagues \xe2\x80\x93 the fact that all of us has our own individual story to tell.\xe2\x80\x9d\xe2\x81\xa3
\xe2\x81\xa3
Joshua: \xe2\x80\x9cThis year we\xe2\x80\x99ve held events on mental health, race, trans inclusion, getting comfortable with being uncomfortable and so much more. The response from attendees has been incredible. The sense of purpose we get from organising this week is unparalleled and the team behind it are phenomenal, every team member does this above and beyond their day job, the passion is unmatched.\xe2\x80\x9d\xe2\x81\xa3
\xe2\x81\xa3
Drink responsibly. DRINKiQ.com'

b'"Recruitment is not only about finding the right person for a role at #Diageo, it\xe2\x80\x99s about helping others realise their dreams. During my time here I\xe2\x80\x99ve been able to connect with people all over the business thanks to the platform that Diageo has offered me; the opportunities to grow yourself are endless." - Karlie Wang, Talent Engagement Specialist\n\xe2\x81\xa3\nDrink Responsibly. DRINKiQ.com'

b'This week we\xe2\x80\x99re celebrating INC week at #Diageo, our dedicated inclusion week with virtual panels, discussions and celebrations happening in countries around the world. To open the week our Chief Executive Ivan Menezes joined our Global Talent Director Louise Prashad for a conversation about our ambition to champion #inclusion and #diversity in our business and beyond.\xe2\x81\xa3
\xe2\x81\xa3
Ivan Menezes: \xe2\x80\x9cThis is an enormous opportunity for us to drive inclusivity to the next level. I want to see us drive change not only within our 28000 people at Diageo, but also with our customers and suppliers, right across our value chain. I want our brands to have a hugely progressive voice. This is our company, our culture, and each one of our actions make a difference to Diageo.\xe2\x80\x9d\xe2\x81\xa3
\xe2\x81\xa3
Drink responsibly. DRINKiQ.com'

b'We are very proud that our Investor Relations Director Belinda Brown has been recognised as a Top 10 Future Leader in the 2020 #EthnicityAwards. \xe2\x81\xa3

b'\xe2\x80\x9cIt is about recognising our differences but also celebrating our similarities \xe2\x80\x93 it is about giving everyone a voice because diversity, #inclusion, equity really do matter. b'We\xe2\x80\x99re delighted to share that the proceeds from the auctioning of our Prima & Ultimata collection of rare single malt whiskies at Sotheby\xe2\x80\x99s will go to @wateraid UK

b'Last week the \xe2\x80\x98Guinness Clock\xe2\x80\x99 from the 1940s returned to Piccadilly Circus as part of a campaign exploring the history of The Piccadilly Lights @guinness 
.
Our Guinness Archives Manager Eibhlin Colgan shares her thoughts:
.
\xe2\x80\x9cGuinness advertising is known and loved the world over and from the first Guinness ad in 1929, Guinness advertising has a special place in people\xe2\x80\x99s hearts and minds. From the toucan in the 1930s, to the surfers of the 1990s and the rugby ads of today, Guinness advertising has been part of our cultural psyche for over 90 years. It has also been at the heart of commemorating and celebrating both every day and extraordinary events, including the moment when the lights of Piccadilly were symbolically turned on in 1949 after years of black-outs due to World War Two. Meeting under the Piccadilly Guinness Clock was a London experience for countless millions of people for several decades \xe2\x80\x93 its \xe2\x80\x98Guinness Time\xe2\x80\x99\xe2\x80\x9d
.
Drink responsibly. DRINKiQ.com'

b'.@crownroyal is bringing its responsible drinking initiative \xe2\x80\x98Water Break\xe2\x80\x99 to all sports with the help of Kevin Garnett, who reminds fans to \xe2\x80\x9cStay Hydrated. Stay Royal\xe2\x80\x9d through moderation. #CrownRoyalWaterBreak\n \nDrink responsibly. DRINKiQ.com'

b'Want to know what opportunities a career in #Sales can give you? We asked our District Manager Siriwat in Thailand :Thailand: to sum it up: \xe2\x81\xa3

b":megaphone: CONGRATULATIONS to our very own Oliver Palmer and his team @fortitudefour who have been crowned winners of the @talisker Atlanic Challenge 2019 - the World's Toughest Row :water_wave:

Oliver Palmer (Head of Customer Marketing, Europe and America Diageo Global Travel), is the first Diageo employee to ever row the Talisker Whisky Atlantic Challenge, and along with his three long-time friends landed in English Harbour, Antigua after 32 days, 12 hours and 35 minutes at sea :trophy:

Join us in celebrating Oliver, his teammates and all of the rowers. Read more on Diageo.com.

Drink responsibly. DRINKiQ.com"

b':megaphone:The first Smashed tour of the new decade is underway! Today, our friends at @collingwoodlearning begin a three month tour of England, reaching 14,500 secondary school pupils. The programme is proven to help young people understand the risks of underage drinking. Workshops begin today in the North East. Stay tuned for updates throughout :performing_arts:\n\nDrink responsibly. DRINKiQ.com'

b'Work is underway to restore the famous clock on the corner of Edinburgh\xe2\x80\x99s Princes Street and Hope Street as part of our project to create a global @johnniewalker visitor experience in the capital.

Known locally as the \xe2\x80\x98Binns Clock\xe2\x80\x99 after the former department store that first installed it, the cantilever clock had fallen into disrepair in recent years. Expert clockmakers @cumbriaclockco are working to restore it to its original glory, including repairing the mechanical procession of hand painted highland figures which march out of the clock to mark the hour and half hour.

Drink responsibly. DRINKiQ.com'
